DATA.LIVE_TEXT: ...I wish Mom were here, flying with us.
I remember her telling Dad, once... that she wanted to grow wings and fly!
Haha, Mom would say really silly things sometimes.
I mean, octopuses can't grow wings!
R-Right? I think they can't... Though that weird monkey did say that we can grow beards.
I understand why Dad doesn't let me travel around, you know... When I was on that planet, I felt...
I wish I could see mom right now.
